entry.title: Enhancing repository-level code completion with selective retrieval | Amazon Science homepage
entry.summary: Self-supervised method for learning when to retrieve contextual information from a code repository speeds up code completion times by 70% while increasing accuracy.
entry.content: Self-supervised method for learning when to retrieve contextual information from a code repository speeds up code completion times by 70% while increasing accuracy.
